profile.title: Accounting Rissetis Georgios
profile.subtitle: Your Trusted Financial Partner
profile.description: With a long experience in accounting and financial management, we provide comprehensive solutions for businesses and individuals.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Our office, located in Pagkrati, is staffed by experienced, specialized internal partners committed to ensuring the interests of our clients. We offer a wide range of accounting and tax services, always with dedication, consistency, and efficiency. Additionally, we strive to provide our services at competitive prices to support every individual and business.

item1.title: FULL & SPECIALIZED ACCOUNTING SERVICES
item1.description:
We undertake the organization, maintenance and supervision of the accounting department at your company's headquarters or at our office. If you choose the supervision of your accounting on your premises , our experienced partner will visit your business providing you with all the services required for the proper and efficient operation of your accounting. In addition, if you choose to keep in our office for your convenience and convenience, we take care of the transfer of invoices -from and to your business- for updating the books, as well as the processing of any kind of external work in public services (D.O.Y., I.K.A., O.A.E.E.).

We provide consulting services for the proper operation of your business.Our services concerning accounting issues are the following:
•	Computerized bookkeeping of all categories of books & preparation of accounting statements
•	Introduction and monitoring of regulations (D.O.Y.) 
•	Establishment / Discontinuation of operations
•	Company formation of domestic companies
•	Expense control and tax support

item2.title: CLOSE MONITORING OF TAX LIABILITIES
item2.description:
We take responsibility for the careful monitoring and timely settlement of your tax obligations in accordance with the applicable deadlines and provisions. Our many years of experience is a guarantee for the prompt and valid resolution of all kinds of tax issues related to your business activity. In addition, we specialize in comprehensive support and mediation during tax audits by the respective auditing authority as well as in the tax management of real estate. Our provided services concerning tax issues are the following:
•	Tax planning and strategy
•	Preparation for dealing with tax audits
•	Tax optimization
•	Drafting, signing and submitting all tax returns
•	Tax advice for covering documentation
•	Internal tax audit to identify possible problems

item3.title: VALID SUPPORT FOR LABOUR AND INSURANCE ISSUES
item3.description:
Our accounting firm provides sound advice on all kinds of employment and insurance issues such as job subsidies, payroll, redundancy payments, labour inspection problems etc. In addition, we can undertake the resolution of tax disputes between partners, employer & employee, or with the government, as well as direct you to the best possible solution for labour issues, based on the current legislation. Our provided services concerning labour and insurance issues are the following:
•	Calculation, maintenance & computerization of payroll
•	Calculation of contributions and amounts payable
•	Compilation and submission of provisional and final tax returns. 
•	Submission of detailed periodic declarations (APA)
•	Monitoring of collective agreements
•	Monitoring of subsidized OAED programs and filing of supporting documents
•	Publishing of payroll statements & printing of detailed individual receipts of employees' earnings
•	Management of recruitment, departures and interruptions of cooperation through ERGANI
•	Consulting on all kinds of labor and insurance issues

item4.title: EFFICIENT SERVICE OF THE NEEDS OF EACH INDIVIDUAL
item4.description:
We consistently and effectively undertake to serve your every need, from the submission of your tax return and the timely settlement of your tax obligations to the settlement of unresolved tax and insurance issues in public services.

Do not hesitate to contact us if you wish to be informed about the best possible way to approach and resolve any issue that concerns you. We offer the possibility of a free consultation at our office by appointment. Below you can see all our services provided to individuals.
•	Submission of tax returns
•	Applications for benefits and allowances
•	Transfer processing to the I.O. Y of foreign residents
•	Submission of leases - submission of lease expirations
•	Mortgage leases
•	Representation and processing of bureaucratic work in public authorities
•	Inheritance, parental benefits and donations
•	Double taxation avoidance procedures
•	Taxation advice for covering presumptions and capital consumption
